pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Positivity and Luck $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(c)Fury$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Produce citrine in the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), trade for it with a villager, or enhance it in the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/crystal_altar)Crystal Altar$().
